name: City Rescue
description:
Note: Play game in FULLSCREEN MODE (Bottom right corner of screen) for Best Experience

Story:

Your city has been struck by a deadly contagious disease. All hospital ambulances are busy. You are a good Samaritan on a mission to take people to the Hospital.

Pick up infected patients and Drop them at the Hospital.

Meanwhile take care to avoid your car from heating in excess. Take breaks at the Parking spots (and "hold spacebar")

This game was made for the Digis Game Jam 2020. The theme was "2020". 

Instructions:

Arrow keys to move car

Press spacebar in front of Infected Patient (the "flashing" people) to pick them up. Only 1 patient can be picked up at once.

Press spacebar in front of Hospital to drop patient safely

Press and hold spacebar at Parking spots to cooldown car

Credits:

- Game engine used: Construct 3

- Game assets: www.kenney.nl

- Music and Sound effects:

  • Music -  https://www.partnersinrhyme.com/pir/free_music_loops.shtml
  • Sound effects - www.kenney.nl and https://www.freesfx.com/

Hey there! If you are still reading this I would like to thank  you for playing the game and please share your thoughts on whether you liked it or not.  All suggestions are welcome! :)
